faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Linka.

q1.question: How does Linka protect my privacy in Notion?
q1.answer: Linka uses the official Notion integration protocol. We only request permissions to read the structure of your databases and pages. We never store the internal content of your documents; we only visualize the connections between them.

q2.question: Is synchronization with Notion automatic?
q2.answer: To give you total control and optimize performance, synchronization is on-demand. With a single click on the 'Sync' button, Linka will bring the latest changes and relations from your workspace.

q3.question: Can I export my graphs for presentations?
q3.answer: Yes, you can export any visualization in high-fidelity PNG format. This is ideal for including your data maps in reports, team presentations, or technical documentation.

q4.question: What if my databases are very large?
q4.answer: Linka is designed to handle complex structures. We have intelligent filters that allow you to hide or show specific databases, allowing you to focus on the relations that really matter.

q5.question: How can I get support if I have questions?
q5.answer: We are here to help. You can contact us directly by writing to support@linka.io or through our official channels. We respond to all queries in less than 24 hours.

intro.title: Welcome to Linka!
intro.content: This is your compass for navigating the complexity of your Notion databases. Let's take a quick tour.

sync.title: Connect with Notion
sync.content: Here you can enter your Integration Token to bring in your real databases. Linka will remember your session.

search.title: Quick Search
search.content: Looking for a specific database? Type here to highlight nodes and filter your list instantly.

filters.title: Property Filters
filters.content: Filter the map by property types (e.g., only see DBs that have Emails) or clear the noise by hiding isolated databases.

inventory.title: Your Inventory
inventory.content: Here you have all your databases. You can see how many properties they have and double-click to center one on the map.

workspace.title: Workspace
workspace.content: Collapse this panel if you need more space to explore your map. Linka is fully responsive.

canvas.title: Interactive Map
canvas.content: Drag nodes to organize them as you like. Zoom with the mouse wheel or use controls to navigate.

layout.title: Automatic Order
layout.content: Did your map get chaotic? Click here and our forces algorithm will reorganize everything in a balanced way.

theme.title: Your Style
theme.content: Switch between dark mode (for concentration) and light mode (for clarity) as you prefer.
